Do not work with WDMedia Player.
Use Divx Player or VLC Player. If Audio still off Download something called instacodecs. just google it and install it and it makes the audio start working on all three players.
If you plan on watching this on anything other than a computer, don't waste your time (like I did)!  Use a more standard audio codec next time!
